name: Spellbinder (CyborgMantis)
description:
Welcome to Spellbinder! You are a wizard running a local potion store! Listen to your customers' requests, check the potion book for each recipe, and mix the correct ingredients TOGETHER to make the perfect potion! But watch out for some customers' requests, as some people cannot have certain ingredients and will need alternatives. 

Things to keep in mind:

- Tested at 1920x1080 resolution

- To use the books, click on a book to open it. It will remain open until you move the mouse off of it. Left and right click will turn the pages.
